root: ^Your characters seems to enter a shop, a good place to get equipment. You realize you do have some money... but not a lot.
^‘Well met, weary traveler. You look like you could use some sturdy armor, take a look.’

armor_buy: ^‘Wait, it doesn’t look anything like what was shown !’
^'I think it is pretty at least ! you should keep it'

c-0: ^'No thanks. I will find a true armor later'
^'A true armor for a true knight then, you're right'
c-1: ^‘I guess I’ll slay dragons in a metal bikini...’

armor_steal: ^‘Hehehe, if you want it so much, just take it.’
^‘Wait, it doesn’t look anything like what was shown !’
^‘Hmmm… Why am I the one who feels robbed ?’

c-0: ^'No thanks. I will find a true armor later'
^'A true armor for a true knight then, you're right'
c-1: ^‘I guess I’ll slay dragons in a metal bikini...’
